verbs.description: some new tesla cars [V: are] being delivered with flaws and owners say getting them fixed is a painful process business insider spoke with 12 tesla owners over the past two months many of whom described a range of problems with their vehicles that required attention in the weeks and months after delivery tesla elon musk
